extension.name: Simple Contact Form
extension.author: Andy Gaskell @ SSOFB
extension.description: This is a very simple Joomla contact form module for Joomla 3 and 4. It is not designed to be best practice, but rather as simple as possible, for an easy entry point for learning and modification.

field.name: recipient
field.label: Form recipient
field.description: Enter the recipient of the contact form's email address
